name: Marcel Salathé
content: Laboratory of Prof. Marcel Salathé ‐ EPFL Skip to content Welcome to the Digital Epidemiology Lab Please check our dedicated website for more information: Digital Epidemiology Lab Using AI to understand, monitor and improve public health through innovative applications. We use AI with online & mobile technologies to build digital health applications. Together with our partners, we use these applications to tackle the health challenges of the 21st century. In code we trust. Back to top
